message.content:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
Memorandum

To: [Client Name]

Subject: Resolution of Damaged Goods and Shortage Issue

Dear [Client Name],

I am writing to inform you that we have received your shipment of [Product Name] on [Date of Receipt]. Unfortunately, upon inspection, we have found that the shipment was damaged during transit and is short [Number] units. The damage includes [Description of Damage].

We have contacted the transportation company to report the damage and have initiated a claim for compensation. In the meantime, we are providing a replacement shipment of [Number] units to ensure that you receive the full quantity of goods ordered.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused and appreciate your patience and understanding in this matter. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.

Thank you for your business.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
Shipping Receiving And Inventory Clerk
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
